name: Ancient power Unbound
text: This card is always treated as an Omni spell. You can discard 1 card from your hand and if you do you can add 1 Ancient or Omni Spell/Trap from your deck. All Omni Monsters on your side of the field gain 500 ATK every Standby Phase ignoring card effects. You can target up to 3 Omni Monsters and/or Omni or "Ancient" Spells/Traps in your GY; return them to the deck and draw 1. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Power Unbound" once per turn.
